personal_info.summary: Experienced Fullstack Developer skilled in designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software systems. Equipped with a versatile and robust skill set, proficient in building end-to-end applications across front-end, back-end, and databases. Adept in working with modern platforms, programming languages, and frameworks.

responsibilities: Designed and implemented a microservices architecture using NestJS, AWS, and Docker, enhancing system modularity and reducing dependencies between components.
Refactored legacy codebases to improve reliability, scalability, and maintainability across both front-end (Next.js, Vite) and back-end (NestJS, MySQL, PostgreSQL) systems.
Developed secure, industry-standard authentication systems using Redis and Kafka to ensure data protection and privacy.
Created custom fullstack services to manage application state, integrate with APIs, and deliver seamless user experiences using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Vite.
Utilized Git for version control and collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure efficient deployment and continuous integration.
Performed usability testing to ensure the software was user-friendly and intuitive, utilizing Jest for unit and integration testing to validate functionality and user flows.
Collaborated with developers to identify and troubleshoot root causes of software issues, leveraging Jest for debugging and ensuring code reliability.
Created a comprehensive test strategy using Jest to automate testing processes, ensuring the quality and stability of software releases across development cycles.
Implemented test-driven development (TDD) practices with Jest to improve code coverage and reduce regression issues.
Integrated third-party ATS clients (Bullhorn, OTYS, Homegrown) using tailored React-based solutions with Redux for state management and Axios for API communication.
Provided mentorship to team members by explaining business logic, addressing code issues, and conducting code reviews using Git and GitHub/GitLab workflows.

education.degree: Technology in Software Analysis and Development

certifications.name: AWS Lambda and the Serverless Framework
AWS - Mastering Boto3 & Lambda Functions Using Python
AWS AppSync & Amplify with React & GraphQL - Complete Guide
NestJS Zero to Hero - Modern TypeScript
